deck:
This Sunday we launched a new initiative, with the aim to see Gateway become a church that is both deep and wide - having deep relationships and friendships, and growing in confidence in sharing our faith with others.

We made an invitation to all those present to come on a journey with us, a journey shaped around 4 practices that we believe will help to create a deep and wide church.

BLESS

We aim to bless one Gateway, and one not-yet-Christian individual/family each week.

EAT/DRINK

We aim to share hospitality with one Gateway, and one not-yet-Christian individual/family each week.

LEARN

We aim to have 15 minutes in a chair daily, spending quality time with God.

LEVEL UP

We aim to take the conversation up a level with one Gateway person and one not-yet-Christian each week.

If you weren't able to be there on Sunday, I highly recommend that you listen to the launch talk above.

We're seeing Lifegroups as the primary way of encouraging and challenging one another to live out these practices and see them become habits. If you're not yet in a Lifegroup and would like to be, please contact the office as soon as possible.
subtitle: An initiative to help us become a church that is both deep and wide.
title: Deep & Wide
